About Me

I graduated from UC Santa Cruz with a B.S in Computer Science. Currently I work at a motorcycle company, Eaglerider, as a Jr. Associate Project Manager. My main responsibilities are using MySQL and Crystal Reports to generate reports for all departments within the company. In addition, I use Photoshop to edit images along with HTML and CSS to design marketing emails on a weekly basis.

During my free time, I continue to hone my web development skills by building beautiful, responsive websites and exploring new technologies, currently ReactJS.

2015-2017
UC Santa Cruz

After transferring from a community college, I graduated after studying for 2 years.

2017-Present
Self Study

Despite graduating, I felt I needed to learn more so I dived into Android App development and published a few apps but realized the market is too saturated so I focused my time to web development.

2017-2018
FreeCodeCamp

I took this free online course for web development which estimated to be over 900 hours to complete. The course taught me everything regarding HTML, CSS, Boostrap, and Javascript. After completing the course, I earned a FreeCodeCamp certificate signifying all hard work I put into personal studying.

2017-Present
EagleRider

I found a job at a company called EagleRider as a Junior Product Manager. My main responsibilities were creating reports using MySQL and Crystal Reports. This job taught me much about the employee boss relationship, communicating with my coworkers, double checking and completing important tasks. While I appreciate everything I learned, I believe my growth has stagnated and it is time to further my career development.
